{{disambig-more|Isengrim|[[Isengrim (disambiguation)]]}} {{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Isengrim Took II | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles=[[Thain]] of [[the Shire]] | position= | location=[[Great Smials]], [[Tuckborough]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1020}} | birthlocation= | rule={{SR|1083}} - {{SR|1122|n}} (39 years) | death={{SR|1122}} | deathlocation= | age=102 | notablefor= | family=[[Took Family|Took]] | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children=[[Isumbras Took III]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Isengrim Took II''' was the twenty-second [[Thain|Thain of the Shire]]. ==History== Isengrim II became Thain in {{TA|2683}} and begun to excavate the [[Great Smials]] in [[Green Hill Country]], which would be the Thain's seat for generations to come.{{App|TA}} During his service the Shire-reform was established in the [[Shire-reckoning]], after which every year of the [[Shire Calendar]] would always begin in [[Sterday]].{{App|Calendars}} During this period also [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] reckoned that [[pipe-weed]] was first cultivated in the [[Southfarthing]] by [[Tobold Hornblower]] {{FR|Prologue}} Thainship passed on to his son, [[Isumbras Took III|Isumbras III]].{{App|Took}} ==Etymology== "Isengrim" is of [[Old English|Anglo-Saxon]] origin and comes from ''isen'' meaning "iron" and ''grim'' meaning "fierce". "Isengrim" is the name of a wolf who appears in many medieval epics, including the story of [[Wikipedia:Reynard the Fox|Reynard the Fox]] which originated in French folklore.{{HM|N}}, p. 760 {{references}} {{seq-start}} {{seq-head | race=hobbit | house=[[Took Family]] | born={{SR|1020}} | died={{SR|1122}} }} {{seq | pvac=Unknown | prev=Last known:
[[Isumbras Took I]] | list=22nd [[Thain]] of [[The Shire]] | dates={{SR|1083}} - {{SR|1122|n}} | next=[[Isumbras Took III]] }} {{seq-end}} {{thains}} [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Thains]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[Category:Took]] [[de:Isegrim Tuk II.]] [[fi:Isengrim II Tuk]] [[fr:encyclo/personnages/hobbits/touque/isengrim ii]]
